name: DEUS VULT Simulator 2017
description:
EVER WANTED  TO EMBARK ON THE HOLY CRUSADE BUT DEUS WON`T VULT? WELL, NOW YOU CAN!! KILL SARACENS AS YOU GALLOP YOUR WAY TO TIMELESS GLORY IN THIS UNFINISHED GAME!!

But seriously though, this is just a meme game I made in two weeks with the help of two friends, but if you guys like it and think I should keep working on it, I'll take your feedback and, well, work on it...

For the controls, arrows to move, Z to shoot.
